item.title: Infinite Image Gallery With R3f An Approach
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As I was looking for inspiration on Awwwards, I came across this beautiful little site: Bien Joué. The site features an infinite image gallery in a 3D space, with some amazing WebGL effects on user interactions.

item.title: Build An Assistant On The Terminal
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction When coding, developers look for references constantly. “What does this snippet of code do?”, “How to implement something in this programming language?
